Package app.controller.oauth

Class OauthController

java.lang.Object
app.controller.oauth.OauthController
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscordOauthController, GitOauthController, GoogleOauthController, VkOauthController, YandexOauthController
@RequestMapping("/oauth")
public abstract class OauthController
extends java.lang.Object
Endpoint controller for oauth authorisation. When user firstly download the web page, its oauth buttons get a link for redirecting user to oauth server for authorising. When authorisation process ends
  1. Oauth server redirects user to this endpoint adding code to the request for identifying server in the future request
  2. The endpoint requests access token, sending received code in the POST (GET for VK) request
  3. The endpoint requests user id, sending received access token in the GET request

  • Method Details

    • oauthEndpoint

      public java.lang.String oauthEndpoint​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Mapping, that receives oauth server request to authorising an user.

      Every children class must call this method in the overridden method with annotation @GetMapping("/[provider]")

      Steps of authorising:

      1. Checks if state in request matches with state cookie in the client
      2. Gets code from the request via receiveCode(HttpServletRequest)
      3. Sends request for receiving access token, using receiveToken(String) with the code received in the previous step.
      4. Sends request for receiving unique user id, using receiveId(String) with the access token received in the previous step.
      5. Attaches oauth id to the request and forwards to the AuthController.oauth(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse)
      Parameters:
      request - contains code
      response - for deleting state cookie
      Returns:
      forward to AuthController.oauth(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) or to the home page, if error occurs while authorising

    • validateState

      protected void validateState​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws MissedStateCookieException, InvalidStateException
      Checks if state in request matches with state cookie in the client.
      Parameters:
      request - contains state cookie
      response - target for removing cookie
      Throws:
      MissedStateCookieException - if state cookie not found in the request
      InvalidStateException - if state cookie doesn't match cookie from the request

    • receiveCode

      protected java.lang.String receiveCode​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws ApiException
      Gets code from the request or throw ApiException.
      Parameters:
      request - for extracting parameters
      Returns:
      code or throw ApiException if request contains error
      Throws:
      ApiException - if request contains error

    • receiveToken

      protected java.lang.String receiveToken​(java.lang.String code) throws ApiException, com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Sends request to the oauth server for receiving access token.
      Parameters:
      code - received from the server in the endpoint request
      Returns:
      access token
      Throws:
      ApiException - if request to the oauth server wasn't success
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if answer format is incorrect

    • receiveId

      protected java.lang.String receiveId​(java.lang.String token) throws ApiException, com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Sends request to the oauth server for receiving unique user id.
      Parameters:
      token - access token, received from the server in the endpoint request
      Returns:
      user id
      Throws:
      ApiException - if request to the oauth server wasn't success
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if answer format is incorrect
